title: Total area of U.S. timberland in 2017 , by region
summary: The chart shows that Rocky_Mountains has the highest Timberland of U.S. thousand with 50/100 being on their U.S.
South holds 208092 thousand of the U.S. thousand , followed by All_regions with 514425 .
North and Pacific_Coast both have 69654 thousand in the U.S.
gold: This statistic shows the total timberland in the United States as of 2017 , sorted by region . In 2017 , the largest area of timberland in the U.S. was reported for the South with a total of 208,092 acres .
